name: WhatsApp UI kit for chat bot design (android)
description:
Focus on the chat bot UX instead of worrying about cloning WhatsApp! Latest chat design UI kit for WhatsApp!

ï»¿

30 message variants!


Ready to use components that resize as you edit the text, powered by auto layout:

  • Message sent by: Business / User
  • Button type: None / Quick action / Call to action / List button
  • Number of buttons: 0 / 1 / 2 / 3
  • Image or media: True or false
  • Message type: First time message / repeat message



See video tutorial on how to use this kit: https://youtu.be/TVrT-rlr_Qc

Please share your feedback in comments.
